ModMetaData.name: [XND] Watermill Tweaks
ModMetaData.author: XeoNovaDan
ModMetaData.description: Current Version: v1.2.1 (5th December 2018)\n\nChanges the watermill generator in several different ways: * Increases its base power production from 1100W to 1400W * Power production is directly influenced by the season * Its power production decreases if temperatures are too low or too high * Adds a new incident which affects watermill generators, both good and bad
